name: Verify the correct role is allocated to a user or not

steps.name: Given the user is on the sign up page
When the user is registering for first time if his "CUSTOMER" is already assigned as waiter by admin the user will be waiter or else he will be a customer
And the "CUSTOMER" should be properly visible in the user page
